about_the_game:
Rush N Crash is an exciting kart racing game where humans and zombies engage in fierce competition, featuring both single-player and multiplayer modes. Players experience a unique adventure full of special abilities and strategies. Here are the highlights of our game:

Single and Multiplayer Modes: Hone your skills in the story-driven single-player mode or challenge rivals in the online multiplayer mode.

Fast-Paced and Competitive Gameplay: Race through dynamic tracks, boost your speed, outmaneuver opponents, and utilize defensive strategies to win.

Unique Modes: Enjoy various modes like Drag Race (short, speed-focused races), Death Race (survival mode), and Classic Race.

Character Selection and Customization: Join either the human or zombie team, showcase your unique style with custom appearances, and get racing!

Strategic Power-Ups: Use rockets, obstacles, and permeability to surprise and outsmart your rivals.

Vivid Visuals and Dynamic Music: Experience the thrill of racing with cartoonish graphics and themed soundtracks that bring the atmosphere to life.

name: Rush N Crash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4130T (2.9GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 (2GB) / AMD R9 280 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are based on similar games
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 – 8600K (3.6 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 (4GB) / AMD Radeon RX Vega 64 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are based on similar games

short_description: Get ready for multiplayer chaos with a single-player story mode that pulls you into the action! Rush N Crash throws you into a world where humans and zombies clash in epic races. Rally your team, hit the gas, and fight for victory!
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Swedish, Portuguese - Portugal, Danish
*languages with full audio support
